Project Documentation

Technical information on the creation of this project

This project has been constructed using a range of tools designed for working with texts in the digital environment. This documentation explains the workflow behind the creation of the Rinconete y Cortadillo Digital Edition project, and outlines the tools used during each of its primary stages, separated into: Digital Edition, Seville Map, and Distant Reading.
